outputs.output_descr:
The Project Preparation Grant is requested to finance three components critical for the preparation of the Medium Size Project "Catalyzing financial sustainability of the Protected Areas system in Montenegro":
- Detailed assessment of the policy and legal environment in the area of PA financing
- Feasibility studies for various revenue-generation options and increasing cost-effectiveness at macro- and site-levels
- Feasibility analysis and budget

project_descr: Project Preparation Grant for Catalyzing financial sustainability of the Protected Areas system in Montenegro
